resources.string: CREATE TABLE "Bill(" "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL , "orderDate" CHAR, "orderTime" CHAR, "outOrIn" CHAR, "isPaid" CHAR, "isMealOut" CHAR, "dollar" VARCHAR, "seat" VARCHAR, "feature" VARCHAR)

CREATE TABLE "Meal" ( "id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL , "billId" INTEGER NOT NULL , "name" VARCHAR NOT NULL , "spcailize" VARCHAR, "dollar" VARCHAR DEFAULT 0, "number" VARCHAR DEFAULT 0)
CREATE TABLE "Food" ("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL , "name" VARCHAR, "dollar" VARCHAR)
CREATE TABLE "State" ("id" INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL , "foodId" INTEGER NOT NULL , "serial" INTEGER, "name" VARCHAR, "dollar" VARCHAR)
